description: Episode number 6 of Series "Teenagers' guide to the galaxy". Part of a series developed for young people aged 9-16 which deals with issues of communication skills, interpersonal skills, life skills and problem solving. "Assertive with adults" focuses on ways of negotiating with parents, teachers and other adults to achieve a satisfactory, or win-win, outcome. Includes personal hints and advice from adults and teenagers such as choosing the right time; listen to what the adult is saying; expressing clearly your wants and needs; negotiating and being prepared to compromise. Features Colette Mann as Fay.
